text: Hälleforsnäs IF is a sports club in Hälleforsnäs in Sweden. The club was once known for its bandy successes. Now the club now plays floorball and soccer. The club was established in 1925. The club and played 21 seasons in the Swedish men's bandy top division. The men's bandy team reached the semifinals during the season of 1978-1979. They lost the semifinal game series to Brobergs IF. On 30 August 2005 it was announced that the bandy activity would be disestablished. == References == ==Other wesbties== *Floorball section *Soccer section Category:1925 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Floorball clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs
title: Hälleforsnäs IF
